android.car.cluster.renderer

类 InstrumentClusterRenderingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • android.car.cluster.renderer.InstrumentClusterRenderingService

  • public abstract class InstrumentClusterRenderingService
extends Service
    A service used for interaction between Car Service and Instrument Cluster. Car Service may provide internal navigation binder interface to Navigation App and all notifications will be eventually land in the NavigationRenderer returned by getNavigationRenderer().

    To extend this class, you must declare the service in your manifest file with the android.car.permission.BIND_INSTRUMENT_CLUSTER_RENDERER_SERVICE permission 

     <service android:name=".MyInstrumentClusterService"
          android:permission="android.car.permission.BIND_INSTRUMENT_CLUSTER_RENDERER_SERVICE">
 </service>

    Also, you will need to register this service in the following configuration file: packages/services/Car/service/res/values/config.xml

      static java.lang.String EXTRA_BUNDLE_KEY_FOR_INSTRUMENT_CLUSTER_HELPER

    • 字段详细资料

      • EXTRA_BUNDLE_KEY_FOR_INSTRUMENT_CLUSTER_HELPER

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_BUNDLE_KEY_FOR_INSTRUMENT_CLUSTER_HELPER
        Key to pass IInstrumentClusterHelper binder in onBind call Intent through extra {@link Bundle). Both extra bundle and binder itself use this key.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • onBind

        public IBinder onBind(Intent intent)

      • getNavigationRenderer

        public abstract NavigationRenderer getNavigationRenderer()
        Returns NavigationRenderer or null if it's not supported. This renderer will be shared with the navigation context owner (application holding navigation focus).

      • onKeyEvent

        public void onKeyEvent(KeyEvent keyEvent)
        Called when key event that was addressed to instrument cluster display has been received.

      • onNavigationComponentLaunched

        public void onNavigationComponentLaunched()
        Called when a navigation application becomes a context owner (receives navigation focus) and its Car#CATEGORY_NAVIGATION activity is launched.

      • onNavigationComponentReleased

        public void onNavigationComponentReleased()
        Called when the current context owner (application holding navigation focus) releases the focus and its Car.CAR_CATEGORY_NAVIGATION activity is ready to be replaced by a system default.

      • startFixedActivityModeForDisplayAndUser

        public boolean startFixedActivityModeForDisplayAndUser(Intent intentParam,
                                                       ActivityOptions options,
                                                       int userId)
        Start Activity in fixed mode.

        Activity launched in this way will stay visible across crash, package updatge or other Activity launch. So this should be carefully used for case like apps running in instrument cluster.

        Only one Activity can stay in this mode for a display and launching other Activity with this call means old one get out of the mode. Alternatively stopFixedActivityMode(int) can be called to get the top activitgy out of this mode.

        参数:
        intentParam - Should include specific ComponentName.
        options - Should include target display.
        userId - Target user id
        返回:
        true if succeeded. false may mean the target component is not ready or available. Note that failure can happen during early boot-up stage even if the target Activity is in normal state and client should retry when it fails. Once it is successfully launched, car service will guarantee that it is running across crash or other events.

      • stopFixedActivityMode

        public void stopFixedActivityMode(int displayId)
        Stop fixed mode for top Activity in the display. Crashing or launching other Activity will not re-launch the top Activity any more.

      • getComponentFromPackage

        public ComponentName getComponentFromPackage(java.lang.String packageName)
        Returns the cluster activity from the application given by its package name.
        返回:
        the ComponentName of the cluster activity, or null if the given application doesn't have a cluster activity.

      • startNavigationActivity

        protected boolean startNavigationActivity(ComponentName component)
        Starts an activity on the cluster using the given component.
        返回:
        false if the activity couldn't be started.

        public void setClusterActivityLaunchOptions(ActivityOptions activityOptions)
        Sets configuration for activities that should be launched directly in the instrument cluster.
        参数:
        activityOptions - contains information of how to start cluster activity (on what display or activity stack).

      • getBitmap

        @Deprecated
public Bitmap getBitmap(Uri uri)
        已过时。 Replaced by getBitmap(Uri, int, int).
        Fetches a bitmap from the navigation context owner (application holding navigation focus). It returns null if:
        • there is no navigation context owner
        • or if the Uri is invalid
        • or if it references a process other than the current navigation context owner
        This is a costly operation. Returned bitmaps should be cached and fetching should be done on a secondary thread.
        参数:
        uri - The URI of the bitmap
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if uri does not have width and height query params.

      • getBitmap

        public Bitmap getBitmap(Uri uri,
                        int width,
                        int height)
        See getBitmap(Uri, int, int, float)

      • getBitmap

        public Bitmap getBitmap(Uri bitmapUri,
                        int width,
                        int height,
                        float offLanesAlpha)
        Fetches a bitmap from the navigation context owner (application holding navigation focus) of the given width and height and off lane opacity. The fetched bitmaps are cached. It returns null if:
        • there is no navigation context owner
        • or if the Uri is invalid
        • or if it references a process other than the current navigation context owner
        This is a costly operation. Returned bitmaps should be fetched on a secondary thread.
        参数:
        bitmapUri - The URI of the bitmap
        width - Requested width
        height - Requested height
        offLanesAlpha - Opacity value of the off-lane images. Only used for lane guidance images
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if width, height <= 0, or 0 > offLanesAlpha > 1
